text: I have written a program that makes sure each cookie has more than 5 chips before moving on.
However, the line if cookie[i] > 5: seems to be problematic, as it produces a "list index out of range" error.
I thought foo = [] created a list with no ending, so I don't get why any number would be out of range in this list.

code:
cookie = []

...

for i in range(0, 11):
    if cookie[i] > 5:
         break
